page.content:
{ {HEALTH
Tor-na-dee hospital was set up in 1899 for hydropathics. This is the giving of mineral waters which were supposed to heal any disorders the patients had. In 1919,after the 1st World War,the Red Cross took over for army men with tuberculosis.I955 the National Health Service took over for people with chest diseases.Now people from all over Scotland come to Tor-na-dee as there is less need for separate hospitals. { }
